Text:
Can't download the torrent, but the magnet link works.  Downloaded this in 1m21s!
Anyway, over 20 days in advance, but looks like the real thing. Thanks!
On second thought, I hope this is not retail ;) (cut off at 16khz, some short silences). Still, sounds decent.

This is one of the best albums he's ever made. I'm definitively going to order this album and all the previous ones. Devin needs the money. He recently put a lot of his stuff on ebay to finance the next Ziltoid-album, if that's not an incentive for you to buy his stuff I don't know what is.
Oh also, he is his own publisher so the money definitively goes to him.

So if you like the music from this genius, buy it. Because he's not that well-known to be wealthy. This guy lives for his music. Hail to Ziltoid!
cant download... i get "No input file specified." every time i try to dl it.
